document_data.name: Ironhanded
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Ironhanded''' was the local [[iron]]workers guild of [[Phlan]]. It operated within the city as of the late 15{{th}}century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Defiance in Phlan|25}}

[[Yanna Hammerbound]] was one of the higher-ranking member of the organization.
